meanings.definition: The process of restoring nerve function to a body part that has lost sensation or movement.
meanings.sent1: After the surgery, the reinnervation of his hand allowed him to feel again.
meanings.sent2: The reinnervation of the damaged leg brought back the ability to move it.
meanings.sent3: The reinnervation of the numb foot turned it into a sensation superhero!
meanings.sent4: Her reinnervation of the paralyzed arm was like a phoenix rising from the ashes.
meanings.sent5: The reinnervation of the hand was a miraculous rebirth of feeling and movement.

meanings.definition: The act of supplying new nerves to a previously denervated area.
meanings.sent1: The surgeon performed reinnervation to restore feeling in the patient's hand.
meanings.sent2: Reinnervation is crucial in cases where nerves have been damaged.
meanings.sent3: The reinnervation of the numb area was like a nerve party!
meanings.sent4: The reinnervation process breathed new life into the once silent nerves.
meanings.sent5: The reinnervation procedure was a lifeline for the damaged nerves.
